data.message: Hi, I have a group for medical support on Facebook. All of a sudden now we cannot open up our files to read. And we cannot remove them either. --The ones with "Show History" to thre right of the title will open but the other ones will not. How do we delete the ones that will not open? Thank you for your help. This was very upsetting as I have spent many many hours on research for our medical group and now cannot open any of our Education Files. !!!!!

replies.message: Hey Camilla. If you believe a feature isn't working properly, you can let us know using these steps: http://bit.ly/2fLYodz. -Joe
The Big Fight Cowntdown Start now = https://t.co/ZOsfAckCfv

Facebook still waiting fo an answer about how to stay in touch with people when you take away the mobile site. as i mentioned, i have a company owned phone, which means i am not allowed to install external apps on it. which means you are taking away my only way to message on facebook.
i cant never get signed in its always saying i have wrong password or wrong emailFacebook
